knimeNode.name: Time Difference
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends the difference between two dates.

fullDescription.intro: Appends difference between two dates with the selected aggregation level (year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, minute) and a selected precision for rounding.
fullDescription.option: The granularity of the difference (in years, quarters, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes)
Name of the newly appended column containing the time difference

ports.dataIn: In data with at least two date columns
ports.dataOut: Out data with the time difference appended
